abstract: At the same time Berkshire Hathaway is planning its takeover of Burlington Northern, it is looking for an exit from two other railroad companies.
snippet: At the same time Berkshire Hathaway is planning its takeover of Burlington Northern, it is looking for an exit from two other railroad companies.
lead_paragraph: Warren E. Buffett is looking to sell off his stakes in two big railroad companies, even as he recently announced a takeover of Burlington Northern Santa Fe.

headline.main: Buying One, Buffett Aims to Sell Off 2 Railroads
headline.print_headline: Buying One, Buffett Aims To Sell Off 2 Railroads

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
